author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Spiel des Jahres nominees for 2025 have just been announced, and some of us are feeling vindicated, as the board games we’ve been shouting about to anyone who’d listen, or through letterboxes and into drainpipes when all else failed, are getting some much-deserved recognition.

Continue reading Meet the board games vying for Spiel des Jahres 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: Meet the board games vying for Spiel des Jahres 2025

author: Timothy Linward
description:
The DnD Barbarian 5e class is a dedicated front-line melee fighter who uses supernatural rage to power their special abilities. Simple yet effective to play, a Dungeons and Dragons Barbarian is always in the thick of the action and prioritizes might above all else. This guide explains everything you need to know to create a 5e Barbarian character.

If you're looking for more general inspiration about which class to pick for your next character, check out our full DnD classes guide. Or, for more help rounding out your Barbarian build, here's all you need to know about DnD races and DnD 2024 backgrounds.

Continue reading DnD Barbarian 5e class guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: DnD Barbarian 5e class guide

author: Jasmine Mannan
description:
Whether it's the galaxy far, far away that makes your heart sing, or simply getting your next brick fix, Lego Star Wars sets should always be on your hobby wish list - especially when they're on discounts. Prices fluctuate quite often with these sets, so it makes sense to grab them while there are deals available, and right now, the Mandalorian: Paz Vizsla and Moff Gideon Battle set is available at a hefty price cut. It isn't a trap! (that's a different movie - Ed.)

Continue reading Get 30% off this kick-ass Lego Star Wars Mandalorian set while you still can
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets, LEGO sets for adults, Best Star
title: Get 30% off this kick-ass Lego Star Wars Mandalorian set while you still can

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Daggerheart, the latest fantasy RPG from Critical Role’s Darrington Press, releases at last on May 20. Books are now reaching hands, and the community can start rolling dice of Hope and Fear in the new, narrative-focused system. Many will still have questions, though. How familiar will this game feel for those who have only watched Critical Role or played DnD? Where is the game going next?

Continue reading Daggerheart, Critical Role's answer to DnD, wants to give you total RPG freedom
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Critical Role campaign 3 cast, episodes, DnD classes, Critical Role cast and characters guide
title: Daggerheart, Critical Role's answer to DnD, wants to give you total RPG freedom

author: Timothy Linward
description:
On Monday, Games Workshop revealed the contents of the latest Warhammer 40k Chapter Approved mission deck, providing the new default set of missions that will feature in organised play and most pick-up games. Fans in the r/WarhammerCompetitive subreddit have raised concerns that the stock level they’re seeing coming to their local game stores simply won’t be enough to meet demand.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k fans worry GW's new Chapter Approved pack will sell out instantly
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k fans worry GW's new Chapter Approved pack will sell out instantly

author: Matt Bassil
description:
A whopping $10,000 prize pool brought tons of Pokémon Pocket hopefuls to the mobile TCG’s biggest ever tournament last weekend. Ultimately, 2,829 people took part in the contest, which was run by Grails.GG and hosted by the streamer Ursiiday. That’s an impressive turnout, given that very few Pocket tournaments in the game’s history have cracked even 1,000 players.

Continue reading New Pokémon Pocket deck finally crushes Giratina in huge 3,000 player tournament
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: New Pokémon Pocket deck finally crushes Giratina in huge 3,000 player tournament

author: Timothy Linward
description:
The MTG card for Jenova, one of the most iconic boss battles from the original Final Fantasy VII and the ongoing remake series, has been revealed. This uncanny alien is a green black midrange threat, who first turns your creatures into mutants, and then lets you draw a frankly silly number of cards when those mutants die.

Continue reading New MTG card immortalises the epic Final Fantasy boss Jenova
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: New MTG card immortalises the epic Final Fantasy boss Jenova

author: Mollie Russell
description:
What are the best couples board games? Regardless of whether you play alongside your loved one or compete with them, tabletop games are a cozy, absorbing way to spend a romantic night in – and the choice of great two player tabletop games just keeps growing. Based on the Wargamer team’s extensive playtesting with our own partners, these are the best board games for couples, as of 2025.

Some of these titles also rank in our overall lists of the best board games and the best card games in the world – but here we've specifically chosen the tabletop games we've found work best for two players - especially romantic couples. If you're after something spicier, no problem - check out our fully tested guide to the best sex board games.

Continue reading
title: The best board games for couples in 2025
